rules.rule: Check if changes to public SDK interfaces, base classes, or method signatures could break downstream consumers like atlan-redshift-app. Flag any breaking changes to BaseApplication, ClientInterface, HandlerInterface, ActivitiesInterface, WorkflowInterface, ObjectStore, StateStore, SecretStore, EventStore, Reader, or Writer APIs.
When deprecating or removing any public API, ensure a deprecation warning is added first and documented in CHANGELOG. Downstream apps like atlan-redshift-app depend on these interfaces.
Changes to public SDK APIs must include corresponding test updates. Untested API changes risk silent breakage in downstream applications.
